alert.note: Alert for Humphreys; Issaquena; Sharkey; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 14 at 12:31AM CST until December 14 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... East central Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... Southwestern Humphreys County in central Mississippi... Southern Sharkey County in west central Mississippi... * Until 115 AM CST. * At 1231 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Onward, or 8 miles north of Valley Park, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Holly Bluff around 1250 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Cary and Louise. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
